response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration, I have decided to offer this item to you at a special price of $750,000. This is a significant discount compared to its market value, reflecting my desire to find the right person who appreciates its true worth. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you wish to make an offer. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 750000}
